attributes.action: Stop the increase of the spousal salary requirement in April 2024
attributes.additional_details: As someone in a long term, long distance relationship, it’s completely unethical to alienate families in this way. This process is already expensive, and shouldn’t be just for the middle to upper class.
attributes.background:
The government intend on increasing the salary requirement to bring your spouse to the U.K. from £18,600 to £38,700. 

This is alienating a very large portion of the U.K. would legally like to be reunited with their families. 

Such a large jump in salary requirement needs to be stopped.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652602
